item.description:
*** I am modifying the dates. I will be there at the campsite on July 2nd and coming back on July 8th. ***

 

I have a camp site in Lafayette State Park camp grounds from June 30th through July 6th. I will be doing 3 or 4 4K footers during this week. Each campsite can have up to 2 tents for 4 adults.

I am offering this out to the group to join me for these hikes. There are several other camp sites still available around my site, (#13), but they will start to fill up quickly. You can join me for the day or for the week!

I am planning on hitting Kinsman North, Flume and Garfield at this point in time but this can change based upon a lot of different factors.

So, if you've ever wanted to climb a 4,000 footer - now's your chance.

The only requirement I have is that you be physically capable of enduring up to a 9 hour hike with elevation gains around the 2K foot mark.

If you are interested, please send my a private email so we can coordinate the trip up north. Note, from Leominster, it's approximately a 3.5 hour drive to the campsite.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: 4K Peaks
